select.name: select

config.noValidChannels: This server has no valid text channels. Please create one and run `/config`!
config.defaultChannelSuccess: Successfully changed guild default channel to <#{selected}>!
config.defaultChannelError: Something went wrong when changing guild default channel.
config.footer: Change guild config any time by running /config

color.title: Custom color
color.description:
Equip yourself with a custom color role.
Select desired color using button below.
color.noColor: Please set your banner color first.
color.tooDark:
This color is too dark for a custom role color.
Please select something brighter.

colorInput.label: Desired color
colorInput.placeholder: It could be color name or hex format
colorInput.invalid: Invalid color format, it could be color name or it's hex format.

profile.notFound: This user doesn't have a profile yet.

follow.followed:
Successfully followed {tag}!
You'll now receive notifications every time he/she comes back from an ‚â•8 hour break.

currentPageInput.label: Current page
currentPageInput.placeholder: Must be a number between 1 and {pagesCount}.
currentPageInput.invalid: Invalid number, must be a number between 1 and {pagesCount}.

perPageInput.label: Users per page
perPageInput.placeholder: Must be a number between 1 and 25.
perPageInput.invalid: Invalid number, must be a number between 1 and 25.

help.title: Help
help.description:
**Leveling system**
- Mindgame tracks your voice and activity on the Discord server and awards experience points for your activity.
- You will advance as you earn more experience points.
- Each level unlocks new level permissions such as access to exclusive channels or roles.

**FAQ**
help.faqQuestion1: How do I check my profile?
help.faqAnswer1: ```Tap Profile quick button or use Apps context menu on desired user.```
help.faqQuestion2: What's the award for X level?
help.faqAnswer2: ```Every guild has different rewards for each level.```
help.faqQuestion3: How do I get experience points?
help.faqAnswer3: ```Experience points are calculated based on your activity on the server. Most of the points are awarded for voice activity. The more you talk, the more points you get. You can also get points for daily reward, which is awarded for the first voice activity of the day on every server.```
help.footer: Use quick buttons to navigate even faster.

optionsInput.label: Options
optionsInput.placeholder:
Split your options using enter, eg:
Yes
No
optionsInput.invalid: Invalid options format, split your options using enter key.

ephemeralChannel.alreadyExists:
This channel is already an ephemeral channel.
Use </ephemeral-channel edit:1116832272021192784> to change message dissapearing timeout.
ephemeralChannel.created:
<#{channelId}> is now an ephemeral channel.
Messages in this channel will dissapear after {timeout} minute(s).

Use </ephemeral-channel edit:1116832272021192784> to change message dissapearing timeout.
ephemeralChannel.edited: <#{channelId}> timeout has been changed to {timeout} minute(s).
ephemeralChannel.deleted: <#{channelId}> is no longer an ephemeral channel.
ephemeralChannel.notFound: This channel is not ephemeral channel.
ephemeralChannel.limitReached:
You have reached the limit of ephemeral channels.
Please delete some of them in order to create new.

utils.userOnly: This feature can only be used by users with profile.
utils.textChannelOnly: This feature can only be used in text channels.
utils.guildOnly: This feature can only be used in guilds.
utils.ownerOnly: This feature can only be used by application owner.
utils.missingPermissions: Seems like I don't have enough permissions to function properly. Invite me again and assure that I have all desired permissions.
utils.noPermissions: You don't have permission to use this.
utils.levelRequirement:
Your level is too low.
Reach **Level {level}** and try again.

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

roles.roles: Seems like I don't have enough permissions to manage roles. It is suggested to put my role above all other roles.
